about_the_game:
FEATURES


- A route for Fin
Many would have liked Fin Euclase (CV: Shingaki Tarusuke) to find happiness, and so we present to you his long-awaited route! This all-new story substantially changes the path Cyrus takes.

- After stories for all main characters*
After stories have been added for all main characters, and of course containing new CGs!

- Bonus short stories*
Features mini stories for 13 characters, expanding the world of Steam Prison.

*Unlocked after clearing the Fin Route

content_descriptors.notes: This title features mature content that may not be suitable for all audiences, including fictional depictions of intense graphic violence, non-consensual sexual violence, and various forms of abuse.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu or equivalent
  • Processor: 1 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+ Compatible
  • Processor: 1 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2300 MB available space

name: Steam Prison - Fin Route

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: Pentium III 800MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2300 MB available space

short_description: Enjoy a route with Cyrus' kind, devoted coworker, Fin Euclase, in this expansion to Steam Prison!
